meanings.definition: The quality of being in accordance with current trends or styles.
meanings.sent1: Her fashionablenesses were admired by everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The boutique always stocks the latest fashionablenesses.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her cat's collar had more fashionablenesses than her entire wardrobe.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were filled with a sea of fashionablenesses, each person a unique trendsetter.
meanings.sent5: The fashionablenesses of the 1920s are making a comeback in today's designs.

meanings.definition: The state of being stylish or trendy.
meanings.sent1: His fashionablenesses made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: She always keeps up with the latest fashionablenesses.
meanings.sent3: The penguin strutted around the ice with an air of fashionablenesses.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with hues of fashionablenesses, captivating all who gazed upon it.
meanings.sent5: The fashionablenesses of the 1960s continue to influence modern fashion trends.
